name: Diggergun
storyline: After arriving on an island off the coast of Cornwall to work as Engineer, you’re quickly put to work in the lithium mines due to the flexibility clause in your contract. With the Cornwall Mining Corporation demanding a £3,000 fee to terminate your employment contract and take you back to the mainland, you’re left with nothing to do but dig.
summary:
Diggergun is an oppressive, 2D, platformer about workers, low wages and the environment.

Will you band together with others to push back against your corporate oppressors, side with your employer to get a leg up or just escape at the first opportunity possible?
